overview: The National Ghost Tour of Great Britain by the 'Ghost Hunter General', Richard Felix, visits Scotland seeking out stories of paranormal activity, supernatural sightings and occurences. We visit some of the most haunted places in the country, from the menacing ruins of Buckholm Tower near Galashiels where a cruel and evil laird still haunts after being cursed by a woman for murdering her husband and son, to Culloden Battlefield where a re-enactment of the battle has been seen as well as a weary Highlander
title: Scottish Ghosts
